formatDescription: MAX was the native image format of earlier versions of the PaperPort document management software. Although this has been subsequently superseded by PDF, newer versions retain the ability to read, but not write MAX files.
provenanceCompoundName: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints / The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints
